typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		users as (userId as string, firstName as string, lastName as string, phoneNumber as string, emailAddress as string)[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> MyDataFlow
MyDataFlow derive(SourceFileName = 'ReportingExtract_' + toString(currentDate()) + ' ' + toString(currentTimestamp()) + '.json',
		users = @(id=users.userId,
		name=concat(toString(users.firstName), " ", toString(users.lastName)),
		number=users.phoneNumber,
		email=users.emailAddress)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	rowUrlColumn:'SourceFileName',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
